query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ai_training_datasets` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `description` text,
  `file_path` varchar(500) NOT NULL,
  `file_url` varchar(500),
  `file_size` bigint,
  `file_type` varchar(50),
  `row_count` int,
  `column_count` int,
  `column_names` text,
  `dataset_type` enum('cpk_forecast', 'anomaly_detection', 'quality_prediction', 'custom') NOT NULL,
  `product_code` varchar(100),
  `workstation_id` int,
  `machine_id` int,
  `fixture_id` int,
  `date_from` timestamp,
  `date_to` timestamp,
  `status` enum('uploaded', 'processing', 'ready', 'failed') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'uploaded',
  `validation_status` enum('pending', 'valid', 'invalid'),
  `validation_errors` text,
  `metadata` text,
  `created_by` int,
  `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updated_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  INDEX `idx_ai_training_datasets_status` (`status`),
  INDEX `idx_ai_training_datasets_type` (`dataset_type`),
  INDEX `idx_ai_training_datasets_created_at` (`created_at`)
)
